name: Malicious Script Execution Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts via the command line, creating backdoors and exfiltrating sensitive data.

action--b7f6c4e4-143f-42b9-8fb8-938730e5.name: Kill malicious script process
action--b7f6c4e4-143f-42b9-8fb8-938730e5.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--8a5c73c6-4eb2-438f-bd42-7918f371.name: Remove dropped backdoor files
action--8a5c73c6-4eb2-438f-bd42-7918f371.description: Delete the backdoor script to prevent future access.

action--3e7a41dc-0f3e-46f6-b8e5-a5bb5b25.name: Initiate full system scan
action--3e7a41dc-0f3e-46f6-b8e5-a5bb5b25.description: Run a comprehensive scan on the system to detect any remaining threats.

while-condition--scan-loop.name: Repeat Scan Until Clean
while-condition--scan-loop.description: Continue scanning the system until no threats are detected.

action--ef5d52c1-1d58-41cf-b4b9-98f8ab24.name: Monitor network traffic for anomalies
action--ef5d52c1-1d58-41cf-b4b9-98f8ab24.description: Analyze network traffic for any suspicious activity to the external IP.

action--059fa3ad-e1af-45ee-847a-826e0f29.name: Update all security patches
action--059fa3ad-e1af-45ee-847a-826e0f29.description: Ensure that all security patches are applied to protect the system.
